welcome_message_body: Welcome to Costa Mesa! Get ready to experience the charming and vibrant atmosphere of our city, known for its great shopping, dining, and cultural scene. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring and enjoying all that Costa Mesa has to offer.

restaurants.name: Taco Mesa
restaurants.description: Taco Mesa is a taco restaurant located in Costa Mesa.
restaurants.address: 647 W 19th St (Meyer Pl.), Costa Mesa, CA 92627

restaurants.name: SusieCakes
restaurants.description: SusieCakes is a bakery located in Costa Mesa.
restaurants.address: 3321 Hyland Ave Ste J, Costa Mesa, CA 92626

restaurants.name: El Toro Bravo Tortilleria
restaurants.description: El Toro Bravo Tortilleria is a mexican restaurant located in Costa Mesa.

restaurants.name: ARC Restaurant
restaurants.description: ARC Restaurant is a american restaurant located in Costa Mesa.

restaurants.name: We Olive & Wine Bar
restaurants.description: We Olive & Wine Bar is a tapas restaurant located in Costa Mesa.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves domestic flights for major airlines such as American, Delta, and United.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves international flights for airlines such as Air Canada, Alaska, and WestJet.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves domestic flights and offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Municipal Airport serves international flights and offers customs and immigration services for arriving passengers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Long Beach Municipal Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Long Beach Municipal Airport serves mainly domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Compton Airport serves commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Compton Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Torrance Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chino Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Chino Airport is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
